Portetotdef: Number of people who have viewed a content (eg: posts displayed on their Facbook wall) associated to your page within the selected period.
Engageuserdef: Exact number of people who have clicked on a post (comment, share, click on a photo, pause video..).
Ptatdef: People that created a topic from your Facebook page through a post that they liked, commented or shared.
commentdef: Fans comments and sub-comments + Page administrators comments and responses.
ViralRatDform: (People talking about it / Reach) X 100(People Talking About This/Reached users) X 100
